title: So i saw a few posts telling people who cant 1v5 carry to git gud.
body:
Exhibit A, a team of 4 challenger/previous lcs players having their team lost by one single player.

These are diamond elo games btw, so this is 4 challenger players and a troll vsing a diamond team.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hKhZxzTNdyM

As much as i believe players should have to work for their wins, please for the love of god drop the "what you cant 1v5 the entire enemy team with 4 anchors for team mates? git gud scrub" attitude.

Even the fucking pros cant do that in their own elo's.
